short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Service Objects extension integrates with Salesforce to validate your contacts, accounts, and leads.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Our USPS CASS Certifiedâ„¢ address validation service improves internal mail processes and delivery rates by standardizing contact records against USPS data and flagging for vacancy, addresses returning mail, and general delivery addresses.

Our extension integrates directly into Salesforce to provide real time address validation. Keep your Leads, Accounts, and Contacts validated and standardized.
